channel.title: Whonix doesn't start
channel.description:
I tried to start Whonix on Oracle VM Virtualbox manager but it doesn't. It's my first time with Whonix. I have the last versions of both programs.
I give that error every time. ` The native API dll was not found (C:\Windows\system32\WinHvPlatform.dll) (VERR_NEM_NOT_AVAILABLE).`
VT-x is not available (VERR_VMX_NO_VMX).

item.title: Whonix doesn't start
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
VBox has a non-VTx mode I believe. Disable VTx in settings then try again.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix doesn't start
item.dc:creator: z5pwajmmt
item.description:
I tried but after pressing F2 in Acer see only informations about device, I can change date, time and 4 options check as enabled/disabled. Another way to use Whonix?

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix doesn't start
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
z5pwajmmt:

VT-x is not available (VERR_VMX_NO_VMX).

Please enable VT-x / virtualization in BIOS.

Read full topic

I tried to start Whonix on Oracle VM Virtualbox manager but it doesn’t. It’s my first time with Whonix. I have the last versions of both programs.
